title: Makin' tracks: The Story of the Transcontinental Railroad in the Pictures and Words of the Men Who Were There
description: First edition bound in black cloth with silver lettering. Oblong, 12" x 11" hardcover is in VG+ condition in a Very Good dust jacket. Former owner's address label is affixed to the lower edge of the front endpaper. His name is stamped at the edges of the bottom block and on the verso of the front fly and on Page 57. Rubs to the bottoms of the covers. The dust jacket has rubs to the head and heel of its spine and to its corners. Rubs to the edges and mild dust soiling to the panels.
author: Lynne Rhodes Mayer
